title: Decision-Making Style Training Simulation for Entrepreneurs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundation in business administration and understanding of general business environments
context.additional_context: VR-based training environment aimed at enhancing decision-making skills in real-world entrepreneurship scenarios for in-service professionals. Provides personalized learning experiences by analyzing participants' diverse decision-making styles and offering feedback

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between four decision-making styles (rational, dependent, intuitive, avoidant) and diagnose their own style
Learners achieve over 80% success metrics by applying rational decision-making strategies in an entrepreneurial simulation
Learners can analyze peers' decision-making styles and establish optimal entrepreneurial strategies through collaboration
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
